.. lcd documentation 

lcd -- verified data structures for busy people
===============================================

Lcd stands for load, check, dump. Those three simple operations you perform everytime you take in data.

Typechecking has not always been a Python strongpoint. In fact typechecking is often times considered counter to Python's philosophy.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   install
   intro
   api
   faq
